snippet: Terry Godwin threw a touchdown pass on a trick play and caught one later, helping Georgia beat Penn State, 24-17, in the TaxSlayer Bowl on Saturday in Jacksonville, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Terry Godwin threw a touchdown pass on a trick play and caught one later, helping Georgia beat Penn State, 24-17, in the TaxSlayer Bowl on Saturday in Jacksonville, Fla.

headline.main: Georgia Beats Penn State in TaxSlayer Bowl
headline.print_headline: Georgia Beats Penn State in TaxSlayer Bowl
